comments.body:
gulp uses vinyl@^0.4.0, but the version of vinyl you referenced is 1.1.0. Consider changing this to

``` ts
/// <reference path="../vinyl/vinyl-0.4.3.d.ts" />
```

I tried that because I think you are correct, however there are other Gulp plugin definitions, such as gulp-if, that also reference Vinyl and they use the un-versioned Vinyl definition file, meaning that tests are not passing.

I'm also not sure how that will work when installing using `typings`, as it would require the end-user to also install the specific vinyl version too.
